alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena, northwestern Tangipahoa and northwestern Washington Parishes, southwestern Walthall and southern Pike Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greensburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Kentwood, Roseland, Osyka, Montpelier, Mount Herman and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 49 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
